text:
October 10, 1957
Mr. James W. Russell
Room 801
450 East Ohio Street
Chicago II, Illinois
Dear Mr, Russell:
Thank you for your card regarding our Act Sheets. A
subscription would cost you $2,50 per year.
We regret that we must make a charge for such materials
but as a membership-based organization # we find that we must try to
recover part of the cost of preparing and issuing such reports. I am enÂ¬
closing a list of the materials we have available for sale. If there is any
thing listed which you feel will be helpful, just ail out the carder form
and send it along with a check made out to die National Association of
Educational Broadcasters. The materials will be mailed the same day the
order is received.
Sincerely,
Enclosure
V
(Mrs.) Judith B. Gans
Secretary
